engineering.title: Software Engineer
engineering.subtitle: Full-stack developer passionate about building elegant solutions
engineering.bio: Experienced software engineer with a focus on web development, open source contributions, and problem-solving. Dedicated to writing clean, maintainable code and creating user-centered applications.

yoga.title: Yoga & Meditation Teacher
yoga.subtitle: Guiding others toward wellness through yoga and mindfulness
yoga.bio: Certified yoga instructor and meditation facilitator dedicated to sharing the transformative practices of yoga and mindfulness. Creating a welcoming community for practitioners of all levels to explore inner peace and physical well-being.
